text: @kumailn For those relying on the fact that the fatality rate (FR) for Covid-19 in the elderly is more than that for young and healthy people, make sure to know that the Covid-19’s FR for young people is still higher than the flu’s FR for the elderly! (Correct me if I’m wrong)

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
